name: Machine Gods
description:
Made by Nicholas Chen

Metallic soldiers march through the streets. Aerial drones launch torrents of rockets, and giant laser cannons pulverize what's left. Above it all, the Machine Gods watch contently as the world burns.

The steel hordes have humanity surrounded. However, legends speak of a faraway mountain where a successful resistance was mounted, where the corpses of mechanical titans litter the territory of mankind triumphant. Within the caverns of this mountain lie your only hope of survival.

Congrats to Joshua Onozawa for being the first player to beat the game!
